verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the tax-gatherers and the sinners <S%G268><s%> were coming <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> Him to listen <S%G191><s%> to Him.

And both <S%G5037><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> [began] to grumble, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> receives <S%G4327><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> and eats <S%G4906><s%> with them."
And He told <S%G3004><s%> them this <S%G3778><s%> parable, <S%G3850><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> among <S%G1537><s%> you, if he has <S%G2192><s%> a hundred <S%G1540><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> and has lost <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, does not leave <S%G2641><s%> the ninety-nine in the open <S%G2048><s%> pasture, <S%G2048><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> the one which is lost, <S%G622><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> he finds <S%G2147><s%> it?
"And when he has found <S%G2147><s%> it, he lays <S%G2007><s%> it on his shoulders, <S%G5606><s%> rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

"And when he comes <S%G2064><s%> home, <S%G3624><s%> he calls <S%G4779><s%> together <S%G4779><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> and his neighbors, <S%G1069><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'Rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with me, for I have found <S%G2147><s%> my sheep <S%G4263><s%> which was lost! <S%G622><s%>'

"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you that in the same <S%G3779><s%> way, <S%G3779><s%> there will be [more] joy <S%G5479><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> who repents, <S%G3340><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> ninety-nine righteous <S%G1342><s%> persons <S%G1342><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

"Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> woman, <S%G1135><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> she has <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> silver <S%G1406><s%> coins <S%G1406><s%> and loses <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> coin, <S%G1406><s%> does not light <S%G681><s%> a lamp <S%G3088><s%> and sweep <S%G4563><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> and search <S%G2212><s%> carefully <S%G1960><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> she finds <S%G2147><s%> it?

"And when she has found <S%G2147><s%> it, she calls <S%G4779><s%> together <S%G4779><s%> her friends <S%G5384><s%> and neighbors, <S%G1069><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with me, for I have found <S%G2147><s%> the coin <S%G1406><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had lost! <S%G622><s%>'

"In the same <S%G3779><s%> way, <S%G3779><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, there is joy <S%G5479><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> who repents. <S%G3340><s%>"
And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons; <S%G5207><s%>

and the younger <S%G3501><s%> of them said <S%G3004><s%> to his father, <S%G3962><s%> 'Father, <S%G3962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> me the share <S%G3313><s%> of the estate <S%G3776><s%> that falls <S%G1911><s%> to me.' And he divided <S%G1244><s%> his wealth <S%G979><s%> between <S%G1244><s%> them.

"And not many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> later, <S%G3326><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> and went <S%G589><s%> on a journey <S%G589><s%> into a distant <S%G3117><s%> country, <S%G5561><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> he squandered <S%G1287><s%> his estate <S%G3776><s%> with loose <S%G811><s%> living. <S%G2198><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> when he had spent <S%G1159><s%> everything, <S%G3956><s%> a severe <S%G2478><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> occurred <S%G1096><s%> in that country, <S%G5561><s%> and he began <S%G757><s%> to be in need. <S%G5302><s%>

"And he went <S%G4198><s%> and attached <S%G2853><s%> himself to one <S%G1520><s%> of the citizens <S%G4177><s%> of that country, <S%G5561><s%> and he sent <S%G3992><s%> him into his fields <S%G68><s%> to feed <S%G1006><s%> swine. <S%G5519><s%>

"And he was longing <S%G1937><s%> to fill <S%G1072><s%> his stomach <S%G2836><s%> with the pods <S%G2769><s%> that the swine <S%G5519><s%> were eating, <S%G2068><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was giving <S%G1325><s%> [anything] to him.

"But when he came <S%G2064><s%> to his senses, <S%G1438><s%> he said, <S%G5346><s%> 'How <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> of my father's hired <S%G3407><s%> men <S%G3407><s%> have <S%G4052><s%> more <S%G4052><s%> than <S%G4052><s%> enough <S%G4052><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> but I am dying <S%G622><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> with hunger! <S%G3042><s%>

'I will get <S%G450><s%> up and go <S%G4198><s%> to my father, <S%G3962><s%> and will say <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and in your sight; <S%G1799><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your son; <S%G5207><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> me as one <S%G1520><s%> of your hired <S%G3407><s%> men. <S%G3407><s%> "'

"And he got <S%G450><s%> up and came <S%G2064><s%> to his father. <S%G3962><s%> But while he was still <S%G2089><s%> a long <S%G3112><s%> way <S%G3112><s%> off, <S%G568><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> him, and felt <S%G4697><s%> compassion <S%G4697><s%> [for him,] and ran <S%G5143><s%> and embraced <S%G1968><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5137><s%> him, and kissed <S%G2705><s%> him.

"And the son <S%G5207><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and in your sight; <S%G1799><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your son. <S%G5207><s%>'

"But the father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to his slaves, <S%G1401><s%> 'Quickly <S%G5035><s%> bring <S%G1627><s%> out the best <S%G4413><s%> robe <S%G4749><s%> and put <S%G1746><s%> it on him, and put <S%G1325><s%> a ring <S%G1146><s%> on his hand <S%G5495><s%> and sandals <S%G5266><s%> on his feet; <S%G4228><s%>
and bring <S%G5342><s%> the fattened <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> kill <S%G2380><s%> it, and let us eat <S%G2068><s%> and be merry; <S%G2165><s%>

for this <S%G3778><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of mine <S%G1473><s%> was dead, <S%G3498><s%> and has come <S%G326><s%> to life <S%G326><s%> again; <S%G326><s%> he was lost, <S%G622><s%> and has been found. <S%G2147><s%>' And they began <S%G757><s%> to be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> his older <S%G4245><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was in the field, <S%G68><s%> and when <S%G5613><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and approached <S%G1448><s%> the house, <S%G3614><s%> he heard <S%G191><s%> music <S%G4858><s%> and dancing. <S%G5525><s%>
"And he summoned <S%G4341><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the servants <S%G3816><s%> and [began] inquiring <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> <S%G302><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> might be.

"And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Your brother <S%G80><s%> has <S%G2240><s%> come, <S%G2240><s%> and your father <S%G3962><s%> has killed <S%G2380><s%> the fattened <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he has received <S%G618><s%> him back <S%G618><s%> safe <S%G5198><s%> and sound. <S%G5198><s%>'
"But he became angry, <S%G3710><s%> and was not willing <S%G2309><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> in; and his father <S%G3962><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out and [began] entreating <S%G3870><s%> him.

"But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to his father, <S%G3962><s%> 'Look! <S%G2400><s%> For so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I have been serving <S%G1398><s%> you, and I have never <S%G3763><s%> neglected <S%G3928><s%> a command <S%G1785><s%> of yours; <S%G4771><s%> and [yet] you have never <S%G3763><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> me a kid, <S%G2056><s%> that I might be merry <S%G2165><s%> with my friends; <S%G5384><s%>

but when <S%G3753><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of yours <S%G4771><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> who has devoured <S%G2719><s%> your wealth <S%G979><s%> with harlots, <S%G4204><s%> you killed <S%G2380><s%> the fattened <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%> for him.'
"And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, ['My] child, <S%G5043><s%> you have always <S%G3842><s%> been <S%G1510><s%> with me, and all <S%G3956><s%> that is mine <S%G1699><s%> is yours. <S%G4674><s%>

'But we had <S%G1163><s%> to be merry <S%G2165><s%> and rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of yours <S%G4771><s%> was dead <S%G3498><s%> and [has begun] to live, <S%G2198><s%> and [was] lost <S%G622><s%> and has been found. <S%G2147><s%>' "
